stakeholders for the materiality assessment process? How?
Key terms
Materiality assessment; stakeholder opinion; objective evidence
Background
To better address the issue mentioned by the submitter, it was agreed to change the question
that was received from ‘When evaluating sustainability matters, is the focus on stakeholder
opinions or on objective evidence?’ to the question above.
